name: backend
description: - Dependencies yang diperlukan:   - node.js dan npm   - express.js (npm)   - express-session (npm)   - mysql2 (npm)   - bycrypt (npm)   - multer (npm)   - csv-parser (npm)   - openai (npm) - sama pastikan tablenya di database crimewatch

scripts.build: npm install && npm install -g nodemon && npm install -g pm2
